resources.string: When preparing to move, press the start button to start counting steps. If you stop to rest or have something to do and want to temporarily stop counting steps, press the stop button. Then, if you want to continue measuring, click the continue button to continue. After finishing or you want to finish, click the finish button to finish. There are 4 parameters on the screen displayed: the first is the current status, the second is the number of steps in walking state, the third is jogging status, and the last is running status. Now, let do it!
